SEARCH

Package com.icx.dom.domain.sql.tools

package com.icx.dom.domain.sql.tools
Java2Sql tool and related classes.

Java2Sql builds SQL scripts for generation of persistence database using domain class definitions in Java source code.

Currently database generation scripts for Oracle, MS SQL Server and MySQL are generated.

Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.icx.dom.domain.sql
    Domain controller (SqlDomainController), base class for domain classes (SqlDomainObject) and internal classes for SQL based persistence mechanism.
